12.content:
Zac got out of bed and walked over to the mirror, he flexed his muscles and said, "Man I'm hot,"He took a showsr and got dressed in his skinny jeans, then headed out for lunch with his brother. When he arrived,his brother was already there, and so he sat down and ordered 2 bacon cheeseburgers.
His brother, Dylan, said "Hey man, you don't usually eat that much,is everything alright?"
"Yeah,"Zac replied, "just hungry" he then ordered two more and some fries. As he was eating, Dylan commented, "Just be careful what you eat, 'cause you can easily get fat like that." But Zac just shook it off.
12.title: Zac Efron

1232.content: After eating like a pig for a week,Zac had put on some weight, but he didn't know it. He rolled out of bed, and then headed over to his bathroom to get ready for his next audition. When he went over to the mirror to check himself out, he noticed a bit of a belly. He went downstairs and asked his girlfriend if she thought he had gained any weight and she replied, "Well maybe a couple of pounds". Upset, he headed back to his room to get dressed,he had his clothes already planned out, a button down shirt and his favorite pair of skinny jeans. When he went to put his pants on,he had to jump up and down, and evem then he couldn't get thwm up to hips, let alone button them. "Man this is bad"he though. And when he tried ro put his shirt on he had to suck in and when he di let it hang out,a couple of the butrons broke. He decided to find something larger, and head to the audition anyway. When he got there the judges got wide eyed, and immediatly told him that he was to fat.
1232.title: 20lbs

14.content:
Bradley cooper was depressed over his latest break up and decided to turn to food, he was rich and he had tons of it. He woke up on his bed with an empty carton of ice cream and doughnut bags. He epwalks to the mirror and says, 'dang must've hit hard last night', he squeezes the skin on his bloated belly he starts rubbing it and notices his shirt looks a little snug and Bradley says, 'hey I don't look half bad Maybe I will put Oman some serious weight.
Bradley was gone from the public for a month and now a reappeared.
He was wearing a blue sweater vest that looked a bit snug on his belly and his denim pants were a bit snug on bigger posteriour. His legs also got bit beefier and his face rounded people dropped their jaws seeing him with his new bulk. Bradley started out at 190 pounds now ballooned up 225 pounds.. He went down to a fancy French restaurant and had meal for 3 people. When he was done topped it off with 2 servings of baked Alaska. His vest came up giving his belly a peek to the world he paid the check and stood up patting his gut saying, 'yeah America this is it.'
Brad got home and stripped down to his boxers he looked at himself in the mirror and thought ,'I definately need to get new clothes',.
14.title: Bradley Cooper

145.content:
Struggling to put on his pants Bradley gave up not being able to sip up all the way. He scratches his belly, "I definitely need to get some new clothes." For the past few days the paparazzi has been taking pictures of him and talked shows made fun of his fuller figure. Brad decided to go to his secret beach house in Mexico.
He landed the next day and head down there. He got some new clothes that fitted him. At lunch he got the servants there to make a feast. It everything Mexican that you can cook and he ate it all. His shirt unbuttoned he was patting his belly, "that's the stuff right there!" Than he got serious bean gas.
The next day he decided to go the beach but was choosing between wearing board short swimming trunks or a speedo.
145.title: Lay low in mexico

Joe just finished eating a gallon tub of hagandaz. He leans back and strokes his belly, 'man I haven't eaten this much since before I joined true blood and now it's canceled I really don't care what happens'. He hasn't gained weight yet but his belly is bloated. Joe just looked it and thought, nah.
2 months in joe has been a eating machine.
He was trying to get dressed he noticed his shirt was rather snug to contain his new ball belly and his jeans were tight around his waist. He figured he put on 20 pounds.
